name: SplashUp!
description:
SplashUp! is a great opportunity to train your visual memory and abstract thinking!

You are surrounded by darkness. The only way to see anything and find a way out is to sprinkle as much paint everywhere as possible. Painting is your vision and orientation in space.

But don't rely only on paint. You will not find a way out without logic and abstract thinking...

*Currently only 25 levels are available.

Thanks for any support :)
